feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:33 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 07:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: ENE 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
